Reviews.Title: Samsung WB100  smart digital camera SO AMAZING I came back and Bought ANOTHER!
Reviews.Author: Billerica, MA.
Reviews.Content: I did A LOT of shopping before settling on this camera.  This seems to be the closest to the RED/BLACK Nikon L810 Coolpix but I found this camera had more bang for the buck and it seemed to be a newer model too.  So I wondered if maybe Samsung took that 26 zoom and improved on it.  I have seen another listing here where the person didn't get clear pics with theirs. I would say it was THAT individual camera having issues.  Another person complained no clear pix on zoom.  This is NOT TRUE if you know what you're doing. This model has a function where you depress the "take" button 1/2 way to "line up" your shot.  You will see green boxes appear. They surround key items in the photo.  So you can't haphazardly take a shot, its more designed for a pro where you will line up your shot AND THEN SHOOT. I was AMAZED with the number of special functions this camera had and I was literally jumping up in down with happiness the more and more I found.  I have the camera here now and will list them (or try to list them all...) below, but you need to see the YOU TUBE VIDEO ON THIS CAMERA --copy/paste this to you tube "Samsung Camera WB100 - Perfect for inspirational shooting!"This is a great YOU TUBE video that shows you an overview of the features this camera has.on top of the camera is a quick function feature wheel here is what is on itA)SCN includes: 1.Beauty shot 2.Frame guide 3.Night 4.Portrait 5.Children 6.Landsape 7.close-up 8.text 9.sunset 10. dawn 11.backlight 12. fireworks13.Beach&snow;B) LIVE PANORAMAC)SMART (setting for most pix it adjusts auto to all situations and lighting)D)1080di HD VIDEO camcorderE)SETTINGS (sound,dispay,connectiv, general)f)DUAL IMAGE (THIS CAMERA HAS A PICURE IN PICTURE SETTING, VERY COOL)G)SPECIAL FEAT- 1. 3D 2.Magic Frame (sunny day,classic tv,old album,Holiday,Billboard1,Billboard2,Mural,Old film,wave,fullmoon,old record,magazine cover,newspaper cover)3. SLIT SHOT (4 OPTIONS) 4.PICTURE IN PICTURE 5.PHOTO FILTER(vignetting,cross filter,fish eye,old film,classic,retro,miniture)5.MOVIE FILTER(to movies,vignetting,fisheye,classic,retro,palette effect 1-4)6.PHOTO EDITOR(8 OPTIONS)This camerera needs 4 AA batteries so I bought the Energizer Battery charger WITH 4 rechargable batteries.$15.99 +s/h for charger and 4 batteries. I also bought a pack of 8 Rayovak green rechargable batteries $15.99 too (for 8 batteries) here that fit my energizer charger and they were a bit better buy, for the batteries alone.I LOVED THIS CAMERA SO MUCH i BOUGHT MY NEICE ONE TOO; with hers, This energizer battery charger works GREAT with the camera its small and plugs directly to the wall, tells you when batteries are charged.I bought a GREAT CAMERA CASE KIT for $35 total with ship by Precision keywords- I GOT THIS AT EBAY... "Precision Design PD-C10 Digital Camera/Camcorder Case"  (came with-1.Precision Design PD-C10 Camera/Camcorder Case2.Transcend 8GB SecureDigital Class 10 (SDHC) Ultra-High-Speed Card3.ImageRecall Digital Image Recovery Software 4.Precision Design USB 2.0 SecureDigital (SDHC) High-Speed Memory Card Reader5.Digital Camera/Camcorder Universal LCD Monitor Screen Protectors 6.Precision Design Memory Card Storage Wallet7.Precision Design 5-Piece Camera & Lens Cleaning Kit  8.Precision Design Flexible Tabletop Mini Tripod9. Zeikos 50" ZE-TR26A Compact Travel Tripod10.Microfiber Cleaning Cloth  11.1-Year Subscription to Digital Photo Magazine Voucher Card (Must be mailed in to activate)12.Free Prints from York PhotoThis camera is very USER FRIENDLY.  Just working with it for a good hour and you should have most the features pretty well down.Recently I took a picture in the complete darkness of a home with christmas lights next door on night setting.  This camera had no trouble pulling it off. I will try to upload the pic.  Also, I LOVE.... the natural looking NON FLASH pics it takes with its SMART setting.  It does have a flash but you don't seem to need it.  The iso settings are so high it picks up the rooms light naturally.  I also took some gorgeous macro pictures of a candle with crystal with a mirror in natural light, another with a candle and the shadows it cast on the ceiling.  I'm an artist so I just love the play of light this gorgous camera can pull off with its crystal clear 16.2 mp pixels.  I will try to load some of these pictures when I figure how, because a picure is worth a 1000 words and these picures are speaking volumes!!!!HERE IS THE COPY/PASTE FOR THE USER MANUAL FOR THIS CAMERA.... it comes with a rather small pamphlet, you will want to favorite this pdf....[...]

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: MoodyMama
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from amazon after they sold out of them at Wal-Mart snd the shipping was fast and the package arrived in perfect condition. My only problem is that the listing says the camera is red and that is what I really wanted however I recieved a black one. I was quite disappointed because I chose the red listing from this seller over another less expensive one just so I could have the red but It was black anyways. Overall this is a great camera and I have had no problems out of it and I haven't stopped taking pics with it since I got it. If you want a good camera to take family pics I would reccommend this one all day long.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Not sure what people are doing to take bad pictures. Mine have all been great right out of the box. Great pictures and a lot of cool features and effects. Good editing software built in as well. Just remember that the further you zoom the more important it is to hold the camera steady. Setting it down or using a tripod works best, but this is true for all cameras not just this one. I've had great luck with the zoom and the wide angle lens is great for family pictures and get togethers. Just a great all around value and very comfortable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: It was so worth the purchase plus I love the color!!! would definitely recommend this product for sale.  So get it

Reviews.Title: Love my new smoking red camera
Reviews.Author: Brebooboo
Reviews.Content: For a refurbished item this camera works extremely well. All the features and functions are amazing I haven't gotten to use them all. I would totally recommend this item to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smart Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my gf for Christmas.She uses it a lot and its one of her favorite things.I love this product. Its amazing.It has terrific quality and it was a great price.

Reviews.Title: this is all u need  !!!
Reviews.Author: Elinda
Reviews.Content: looks very nice and sleek and also works great !! for perfect precision I have my other camera that I paid lot more few years ago, this one is to grab and go - and its perfect for that. Shutter speed isn't delayed what drove me crazy in my other point and shoot. Takes very nice pics and good videos - I am about to have a baby so that was main reason for this purchase. Huge zoom and it actually takes sharp pics too !! just make sure ur hands are steady. About the touch screen - there is no touch screen - which is fine with me but they advertise it so that's a mistake. Overall great camera with enough of zoom and pixels - for normal family use u don't need anything else - as long as u have basic knowledge of how to use it before u criticize it that something doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: I was disappointed in this camera
Reviews.Author: Nita
Reviews.Content: It was heavy with 4 AA batteries. Some of the pictures came out yellow from not enough light and was slow shutter speed. I did like the feel of holding it and the close ups were great. I returned it and bought the Samsung WB250 and I love it. Lighter and not so complicated to use.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality and Samsung service!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Battye
Reviews.Content: I bought a Samsung WB100 in March 2013 and less than 6 months later it is falling apart!!! The features and zoom are excellent but the quality is terrible!!! The rubber handgrip is peeling off and the Samsung agent inspecting it said 'You must be holding it wrongly and have damaged it by holding it wrongly!!! It is a handgrip! there is no other way to hold it!Samsung and Argos will not repair or replace the camera which is clearly poorly made, there is no damage to the camera but Samsung have little or no so called 'customer service'Buy Nikon if you want quality, I know I will. I need a new camera now and a new phone and it will not be Samsung after experiencing their service.Do not buy from Argos either!

Reviews.Title: Grand daughter Loves it
Reviews.Author: teresa watson
Reviews.Content: yes my grand daughter loves it she never goes any where with out. She loves taking pictures of her horses

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Loandtee
Reviews.Content: A real good beginner camera. Takes sharp pictures and for the money paid it seems to be a real reasonable product!!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Nigel Taylor
Reviews.Content: The service received from the suppliers was great and on time espescially since it was the holiday period. The camera is really good for its price . works well takes great pictures. The only thing i wished it came with rechargeable batteries.

Reviews.Title: REGARDING THE SAMSUNG WB100 SMART DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Donna Bouchie
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, the only thing I would ask the distributors would be if a more indepth book would be included with it for people who don't know a lot about it.But otherwise, I do like the camera a lot.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Robinson
Reviews.Content: My Daughter is still exploring this camera. It has a huge lcd display on the back, does panoramic photos, video, on camera editing, and a host of other features, great price, nice camera happy Daughter!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: B RatingSeems to be pretty nice except for the occasional photos that are off focus even when using auto focus!

Reviews.Title: Cool!
Reviews.Author: Shaney Quintanilla
Reviews.Content: The zooming and the pixels are great for the price I paid.I'm able to get pictures out of my recording.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: This is an overall great camera for the price but right off the bat I have to say that many of the adds are misleading. This camera does NOT have a touch screen as indicated. With that said this camera has tons of little features and options.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: BarbaraB
Reviews.Content: Just a casual photographer but all the extra features with this camera have significantly improved my photos.  Simple to use, several fun "frames" (magazine cover, billboard, man in the moon)and the ability to do panorama shots is wonderful.By the way - found a great companion, compact camera bag for this camera here at Amazon - perfect fit (snug - no significant extra room though): Lowepro LP36214 Adventura Ultra Zoom 100 Shoulder Bag - Black (Camera)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Susan Anderson Borror
Reviews.Content: I was very well pleased with this camera. It takes good quality pictures and it is attractive. I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: DKH in Iowa
Reviews.Content: My son just received this camera for Christmas. Had also been looking at the Nikon L810 but he has found this camera to have more features and more megapixels also. He is only 10 but he is a great photographer and will be using this for 4-H pictures and many in the past have been chosen for a state exhibit if he would have been old enough. Awesome camera according to him!! We would not hesitate to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: nlev2000
Reviews.Content: what i was expecting. camera came in very good condition.my son will love it when he gets it at christmas time

Reviews.Title: Not a Smart Camera!
Reviews.Author: marci carter
Reviews.Content: Title is very misleading! This is not a smart camera! Does not upload pictures to internet automatically as you would think! Buyer beware!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: sarina
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my daughter for Christmas.  So far it seems like a perfect fit for her.  Lots of features.  Love that the lens cover can be attached.  This camera would be great for an older person with difficulty gripping items.  Wtih the bulky right side of the camera ("handle") a confident grip is certain.  Easy to use.  Just wish it came with the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Sad!!!
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: Bought this to go to Disney with the kids for the first time and the pics are horrible!!! It took 3 to 5 pics to get a good one. I am so sad that we lost all the memories with our kids. Going to call Samsung to see if I got a bad camera. The people that sold it were great!! No problems with them. The camera just sucks

Reviews.Title: Not really satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Gloria J. Heimdal
Reviews.Content: I was quite disappointed with our Samsung.  It looked to me like it was a used one and it wasn't boxed nice when we got it.  It looked to us like it was just stuck in spare box and sent.  The instructions were practically useless.  My husband got on the internet and found some instructions that helped.  We haven't even taken a picture with it yet.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKED BUT NO LENS CAP PROVIDED.
Reviews.Author: Winstone66 "Winstone66"
Reviews.Content: IT WORKED FINE BUT NO LENS CAP WAS PROVIDED.  I HAD TO BUY ONE FOR ANOTHER 10 DOLLARS TO FIT FROM MIKE'S CAMERA.  OTHER THAN THAT.  IT DID WHAT I BOUGHT IT FOR..

Reviews.Title: Traditional throw away batteries? Really?
Reviews.Author: Still Shopping "Real-tor"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to purchase a cool, sexy looking easy to use camera with these specs (particularly the larger lens and side angle shot capable) at this kind of price that I missed what I consider a crucial flaw... the camera comes with a traditional THROW AWAY battery system. It hadn't occurred to me that a mid-level point-n-shoot advanced would NOT come with a rechargeable battery pack and charger. I didn't think anyone still sold a camera over $35 that still use's disposable, earth destroying batteries. I was astounded when I'd used the camera for 140 pics and the low battery indicator went on and I opened the battery compartment to find traditional disposable batteries. I guess I get another set of re-chargable's and use them - but they don't seem to have as good battery life as a manufactur's designed battery pack.  What a disappointment.I haven't decided yet if I'll return the camera or invest in a new set of independent re-chargables. But just be aware of what you get with this.

Reviews.Title: 26x Zoom for Nothing
Reviews.Author: jmk12489
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera thinking I would give Samsung a try since their cell phones are great. I was very upset when I got home and all the pictures were blurry anywhere past 7x zoom. Why does it have 26x zoom if all the photos are blurry.

ProductInfo.Features:
3" screen
26x Optical Zoom
HD Video 3D Panorama
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB100 Smart Digital Camera (Red)
